title: Wasp Gun
summaries: The Wasp Gun is a Hardmode magic weapon which is dropped by Plantera with a 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) or 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) chance. It fires 2–4 / 2–6 homing wasp projectiles that ricochet off surfaces, and home in on nearby enemies and deal damage to them. It is essentially an upgraded Hardmode version of the Bee Gun. Wasps deal no knockback.

On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, the Wasp Gun has 10 <linked>armor penetration</linked>. The <linked>Hive Pack</linked> increases the defense penetration of wasps from 10 to 15, as well the base damage of the Wasp Gun from 31 to 36.
Its best modifier is Mythical.
Its best modifier is Demonic or Deadly for damage output, or Mystic for mana conservation because it cannot get modifiers that affect knockback.
